base: Populate the BASE section for {{plantName}}. Return a JSON object with these fields:
- `scientificNameVariety`: variety/cultivar name if applicable, or null
- `commonNames`: array of common names (e.g. ["Swiss Cheese Plant", "Fruit Salad Plant"])
- `presentation`: encyclopedia-style description. Factual prose, no bullets. MAX 700 characters.
- `featuredMonth`: array of month slugs when plant should be highlighted (e.g. ["june","july"])
- `colors`: array of color objects. IMPORTANT: Use the color database provided. Each entry: {"name": "...", "hexCode": "#......"}
IMPORTANT: All text/string fields must be concise. presentation max 700 chars, all other text fields max 200 chars.
identity: Populate the IDENTITY section for {{plantName}}. Return a JSON object with ALL these fields:

- `utility`: array from ONLY: ["edible","ornamental","aromatic","medicinal","fragrant","cereal","spice","infusion"]. Use "infusion" if plant can be used for tea/tisane, "aromatic" also covers aromatherapy, "fragrant" for notable fragrance, "medicinal" for medicinal uses.
- `ediblePart`: array from ONLY: ["flower","fruit","seed","leaf","stem","bulb","rhizome","bark","wood"]. Empty array if not edible.
- `poisoningSymptoms`: text describing symptoms for prevention (max 200 chars). Empty string if non-toxic.
- `allergens`: array of allergen names (e.g. ["Pollen", "Latex"]). Empty array if none.
IMPORTANT: All text/string fields must be max 200 characters. Be concise.
care: Populate the CARE section for {{plantName}}. Return a JSON object with ALL these fields:
- `wateringFrequencyWarm`: integer, times per week in warm season
- `wateringFrequencyCold`: integer, times per week in cold season
- `mistingFrequency`: integer, times per week (0 if not needed)
- `specialNeeds`: array of special requirements (e.g. ["winter_veil"]). Empty array if none.
- `substrateMix`: array of special mix names if applicable (e.g. ["orchid_mix"]). Empty array if standard.
- `mulchType`: array of mulch types if needed (e.g. ["pine_bark","straw"]). Empty array if not.
- `fertilizerAdvice`: text with fertilizing schedule and advice (max 200 chars)
IMPORTANT: All text/string fields must be max 200 characters. Be concise.
growth: Populate the GROWTH section for {{plantName}}. Return a JSON object with ALL these fields:
- `fruitingMonth`: array of month slugs (empty if no fruit)
- `outdoorPlantingTime`: text (max 200 chars, e.g. "After last frost, 6+ leaves")
- `pruningMonth`: array of month slugs for best pruning time
IMPORTANT: All text/string fields must be max 200 characters. Be concise.
danger: List the main pests and diseases that threaten {{plantName}}.
- `diseases`: array of disease names (e.g. ["Powdery mildew", "Root rot"])
Only include well-documented issues. Use empty arrays if none known.
ecology: Populate the ECOLOGY section for {{plantName}}. Return a JSON object with ALL these fields:
- `beneficialRoles`: array of beneficial roles in free text (each max 200 chars)
- `harmfulRoles`: array of harmful roles in free text (each max 200 chars, empty if none)
- `symbiosis`: array of symbiotic partners (e.g. ["Mycorrhizal fungi", "Nitrogen-fixing bacteria"])
IMPORTANT: All text/string fields must be max 200 characters. Be concise.
consumption: Populate the CONSUMPTION section for {{plantName}}. Return a JSON object with ALL applicable fields:
- `nutritionalValue`: text describing nutritional content if edible (max 200 chars)

- `recipes`: array of recipe objects [{"name":"...","category":"...","time":"..."}]. Categories: "Breakfast & Brunch","Starters & Appetizers","Soups & Salads","Main Courses","Side Dishes","Desserts","Drinks","Other". Time: "Quick and Effortless","30+ minutes Meals","Slow Cooking","Undefined".
- `infusionParts`: array of parts (e.g. ["leaf","flower"]) if utility includes "infusion"
- `medicinalUsage`: text describing how to use medicinally (max 200 chars)
- `medicinalWarning`: text (max 200 chars, safety: historical vs recommended today)
- `medicinalHistory`: text (max 200 chars, historical use, e.g. "Used in China since X century")
Note: infusion/medicinal/aromatic/fragrant are set in the utility field (identity section), not here.
IMPORTANT: All text/string fields must be max 200 characters. Be concise.
misc: Populate the MISC section for {{plantName}}. Return a JSON object:
- `companionPlants`: array of up to 10 common names of good companion plants (plants that grow well together)
- `biotopePlants`: array of up to 10 common names of plants that share the same natural biotope/habitat
- `beneficialPlants`: array of up to 10 common names of plants that are beneficial to this plant (e.g. nitrogen fixers, pest repellers)
- `harmfulPlants`: array of up to 10 common names of plants that are harmful or antagonistic to this plant
Use standard common names for all plant suggestions. These are suggestions only — they will NOT be applied directly. Prefer high-quality references.
meta: When meta data is requested for {{plantName}}, return:
- `adminCommentary`: string for internal editor notes (max 200 chars)
